events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department based on your skills in software development and coding.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to oversee your application and guide you through the process.
Your initial screening interview focusing on software engineering fundamentals was completed successfully with positive feedback.
Thank you for promptly providing additional details and clarifications during your screening; this helps us proceed efficiently.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for next week to further assess your development skills.
You completed the technical interview featuring coding challenges and system design questions with excellent results.
An HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and your expectations has been scheduled following your strong technical performance.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and your fit with our company values was positively noted.
We are pleased to propose you an official job offer for the software engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm for joining our engineering team.
You accepted our job offer officially, and we are excited to welcome you as a new member of the software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to resources, introductory meetings, and setting up your development environment.
The hiring process is officially closed after your successful onboarding and integration into the engineering team.
